it was reported as internal error - a little error dialog popped up

Adam, are you saying:

1) that the error handling is incorrect - if you can't connect you should just 
receive a simple error warning dialog, not an exception trace (I agree)

or

2) that you should not have received the error in the first place?

1)
as a user, i have no idea if this exception is valid or not but
if it's simply caused by eclipse not being able to connect to some server,
then it should be handled and presented to me as a connection problem, not an 
internal error

I'll need to confirm this but I believe I fixed the cause of 1) a couple of 
days ago as part of another bug fix so we should get the right message in F3.
I have confirmed that this has indeed been fixed in F3
